wouldYouRather.name: Would You Rather
questions: Would you rather be able to fly or be invisible?
Would you rather live in a treehouse or a castle?
Would you rather have super strength or super speed?
Would you rather be able to talk to animals or speak every human language?
Would you rather have a pet dragon or a pet unicorn?
Would you rather always be 10 minutes late or 20 minutes early?
Would you rather have no homework forever or no chores forever?
Would you rather live in a world with no internet or no cars?
Would you rather eat only pizza for a year or only ice cream for a year?
Would you rather be the funniest person in the room or the smartest?
Would you rather be able to breathe underwater or fly through the sky?
Would you rather have a pause button for your life or a rewind button?
Would you rather always win board games or always win video games?
Would you rather have a personal chef or a personal chauffeur?
Would you rather live in a world where it's always summer or always winter?
Would you rather be famous but always busy or unknown but free?
Would you rather have the ability to read minds or predict the future?
Would you rather explore outer space or the deepest ocean?
Would you rather have more time or more money?
Would you rather have one wish granted today or three wishes in 10 years?
Would you rather be really good at one thing or pretty good at everything?
Would you rather meet your favorite celebrity or be on TV?
Would you rather have a magic carpet or a time machine?
Would you rather eat a live bug or lick a stranger's foot?
Would you rather have fingers as long as your legs or legs as long as your fingers?
Would you rather always have to skip everywhere or always have to walk backwards?
Would you rather have no eyebrows or only one eyebrow?
Would you rather sweat maple syrup or sneeze glitter?
Would you rather have to sing everything you say or dance everywhere you go?
Would you rather only be able to whisper or only be able to shout?

questions: If you could have any superpower, what would it be?

If you could teleport anywhere right now, where would you go?
If you could freeze time, what would you do?
If you could shrink to the size of an ant, what adventure would you have?
If you could grow to be 50 feet tall, what would you do first?
If you could have X-ray vision, how would you use it?
If you could control the weather, what would you create?
If you could breathe underwater, where would you explore?
If you could talk to plants, what would you ask them?
If you had a magic doorway to anywhere, where would it lead?
If you could turn into any animal, which would you pick?
If you could have any fictional object, what would it be?
If you could make one thing from a movie real, what would it be?
If you could have a sidekick, who or what would it be?
If you discovered you had powers, would you tell anyone?
If you could give everyone in the world one power, what would it be?
If you could have any superpower but only for one hour a day, what would you choose?
If you found a genie, what would your three wishes be?
If you could bring any cartoon character to life, who would it be?

imagination.name: Imagination & Dreams
questions: If you could go anywhere in the world, where would you go?
If you could live in any time period, when would it be?
If you could have dinner with anyone, who would it be?
If you could be any fictional character, who would you be?
If you could build your dream house, what would it look like?
If you could invent something, what would it be?
If you could have any job when you grow up, what would it be?
If you could meet any historical figure, who would it be?
If you could create a new holiday, what would it celebrate?
If you could design a theme park, what would the rides be?
If you could make up a new sport, what would the rules be?
If you could live in any movie or book world, which would you choose?
If you could have a zoo with any three animals, which would you pick?
If you could create a new ice cream flavor, what would it be?
If you could name a new planet, what would you call it?
If you could design your own school, what would it be like?
If you could have any animal as a best friend, which would it be?

If you discovered a new island, what would you call it?

If you could pick a new name for yourself, what would it be?

If you could live in any country, where would you live?
